title: Sweet Relish
description: Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse clear out the docket with gusto, answering questions about pickle relish, Pee-wee, apartment tours, and the difference between Jim Varney and Verne Troyer.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
